title: Chronicle
body: An online platform providing a serene space to honor and cherish the memories of loved ones. Built with Python, Django, and MySQL.

title: Kanesa
body: A comprehensive warehouse management system tailored for Japanese businesses, optimizing inventory, logistics, and storage. Developed with Laravel, Nuxt.js, and MySQL.

title: Sagami
body: Efficient parking lot management solution designed for Japanese businesses, offering real-time tracking and payment processing capabilities. Powered by Laravel, Nuxt.js, and MySQL.

title: ITreat
body: Integrated fabric distribution management system and e-commerce platform, enhancing supply chain management and online sales. Developed using Laravel and MySQL.

title: PORT
body: A robust web-based system facilitating efficient management of land trading and company finances, featuring detailed insights and reporting tools. Built with Laravel, Vue, and MySQL.

title: Balimall
body: Empowering Balinese companies with a localized e-commerce platform, facilitating online sales and business growth. Developed with Django and MySQL.
